documentation.value: CSV with tuples of Risk Adjustment data, including patient ID, Condition Category code, suspectType, evidenceStatus, evidenceStatusDate, and hiearchicalStatus.

The $evaluate-risk-condition-category operation will always return one [Parameters](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/parameters.html). The [Risk Adjustment Coding Gap Report Bundle](StructureDefinition-ra-measurereport-bundle.html) for a patient is returned in a `Parameters.parameter` element, with each `Parameters.parameter`element for a unique patient.
